Content: After trying two other apps that kept crashing on me, I decided that third time was the charm. This apps is amazing. Very customizable and amazing picture backgrounds too. Would definitely recommend it. Using it for my wedding day count down😊!!

Everything is good untill today I ,just for fun, set a countdown to *2096th year November 29th* and BOOM.. the app started crashing all the time. Not able to open it :( You guys don't test your apps ??? Fire your testers right away and please update the app 🙏 Update: The error is ArthematicException.
